title: When the Foundation is Solid, Everything is Possible.
description: A platform powered by modern technologies.

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: The backbone of modern web. SSR, API, performance.
nextjs.whyWeChose: Next.js provides all the features we need for modern web development under one roof. With SSR support, API routes, and file-based routing system, it accelerates our development process.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Build your design system with code.
tailwind.whyWeChose: Tailwind CSS is an excellent tool for rapid prototyping and creating consistent design systems. Its utility-first approach allows us to create reusable components.

ai.title: GPT-4o & Claude 3.5
ai.description: Create with prompts, explore with AI.
ai.whyWeChose: GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 complement each other with their different strengths. By using these two engines together, we can provide richer and more accurate outputs to our users.
